channel.title: [PI]No prayer draining[PI]

item.title: [PI]No prayer draining[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Gamerburn Gamerburn
item.description:
@Gamerburn wrote:

Okay… What i want to do is make so donators prayer points doesnt drain. I tried adding:

if (c.isDonator == 1) { Config.PRAYER_POINTS_REQUIRED = false; } else { Config.PRAYER_POINTS_REQUIRED = true; } But now i realise this isnt anything about not draining prayer… Duh…

Anyone got any ideas?

Read full topic
